entry.title: when rake new_post command does not work in zsh
entry.content:
To work around the problem, use below command

Liquid error: ClassNotFound: no lexer for alias ‘shell’ found

Another way to avoid the problem is to add next configuration in your .zshrc

Liquid error: ClassNotFound: no lexer for alias ‘shell’ found

entry.title: how to use octopress as to posting and deploying to heroku
entry.content:
When a repo is cloned, it has a default remote called “origin” pointing to your forked repo on GitHub. To keep track of the original repo, you need to add another remote repo named “upstream”

Liquid error: ClassNotFound: no lexer for alias ‘shell’ found

Those above command will allow you to synchronize the original octopress code.

Now, it’s time to post a new writing on octopress

Liquid error: ClassNotFound: no lexer for alias ‘shell’ found

This command will set the default repository to be effected by push and fetch command.

Liquid error: ClassNotFound: no lexer for alias ‘shell’ found

The below commands will commit the modified codes and push to heroku repository so that heroku can recognize your posting.

Liquid error: ClassNotFound: no lexer for alias ‘shell’ found
